short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GrammarWise provides easy access to a dictionary, thesaurus, spelling and grammar checker by clicking the favicon on the toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find word definitions and synonyms, fix typos and grammar mistakes, and improve the clarity of your written communication.

How to use the language tool:
- Add the extension to your Chrome™ browser
- Pin the extension to your browser's toolbar for quick access to the language widget
- Use the Dictionary to look up a word's meaning, pronunciation, and usage examples  
- Find synonyms and antonyms for any word using the Thesaurus 
- Identify and correct spelling errors using the Spell checker 
- Use the Grammar check to fix grammatical, punctuation, syntax, and stylistic errors

We welcome your ideas and suggestions to improve this extension. Please note that you can uninstall the extension if you are dissatisfied with the product.

Upon clicking the button above, you confirm that you have read & agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and consent to install this Chrome™ extension.
